summary: This bill, the "Disengaging Entirely From the United Nations Debacle Act of 2025" (DEFUND Act), aims to terminate the United States' membership in the United Nations and all its affiliated bodies. It mandates the repeal of relevant legislation, the closure of the US Mission to the UN, and prohibits future funding and participation in UN activities, including peacekeeping operations. The bill also seeks to withdraw from the Headquarters Agreement, deny diplomatic immunity to UN personnel, and prevent the US from rejoining the UN without Senate approval.
